testcase.name: TC17 User should be able to register with the correct credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User goes "automationUrl"............................................passed And User click on sign in link..............................................passed And User enters his or her email address on create an account part..........passed And User enters his credentials............................................passed And User clicks on register button..........................................passed Then User verifies that account has been created............................passed And User closes webpage.....................................................passed
